overview: Encountering villain Super Pro Gamemaster II, the team must stop his violent video game, "Big Bad Bully," from leading the kids down a deadly path of more cruelty among students. The Bible Adventure Team help Max, Sam and Adam learn that being a victim is worse than risking a confrontation with a bully. Josh Carpenter also learns that no weapon formed against God's children will prosper.
title: Bibleman-Powersource-Blasting the Big Gamemaster Bully
